name: Permet
body:
The Graphiti Diagram Editor for the Fowler DSL in its very first version. Shows the integration of Xtext and Graphiti to work with the very same model.

![Xtext Editor, Graphiti Editor and EEF Properties View](https://github.com/joergreichert/Permet/raw/master/wiki/fowlerDslGraphitiV001.png)

See also the [Spray](http://code.google.com/a/eclipselabs.org/p/spray/) project, a generator framework for creating domain specific graphical editors.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
